hooks.command: gt prime && gt mail check --inject && gt nudge deacon session-started && /Users/sws/gt/scripts/track-session-cost.sh start $(tmux display-message -p '#S' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown')
/Users/sws/gt/scripts/track-session-cost.sh end $(tmux display-message -p '#S' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') $(gt hook --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.bead_id // empty' || echo '')
